events.body: utACK, looks simple and a good bit of cleanup
Done.. I have just reverted doc/release-notes and doc/Doxyfile.
Looks good to me, apart form leveldb nit
Also please remove the URL from the commit message.

I have removed the URL.
(But kept the tool's name. Let me know if this a problem.)

comments.diff_hunk:

+# It is advised to generate a default header using "doxygen -w html
comments.body: Don't change this, it will be fixed if/when we update the Doxyfile.

 - `b5ec5fe` update getnetworkinfo help with subversion
 - `ad6e601` RPC additions after headers-first

-- `2aa6329` Enable customising node policy for datacarrier data size with a -datacarriersize option
comments.body: This is an Americanisation (also, release notes are historical/immutable)

comments.diff_hunk:

comments.body: This won't work as bitcoinstrings.cpp is generated during build. You need to fix the spelling just in the "normal" source.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -71,7 +71,7 @@
 
 #if defined(OS_ANDROID) && __ANDROID_API__ < 9
 // fdatasync() was only introduced in API level 9 on Android. Use fsync()
-// when targetting older platforms.
comments.body: Please don't change the files inside `src/leveldb` - they come verbatim from upstream, merging this change would make it harder to keep the subtree up to date
